entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-04-14
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Improving Navigation Speed and Performance #14591
  • Enable using Safari dev tools with BlazorWebView #14590
  • Month name is shown by computer region option not by computer language #14589
  • label created dynamicaly in code doesn't strech like it should #14588
  • ImageButton with FontImageSource becomes invisible on ContentPage (but can still be clicked) if you move away from the tab and come back to the tab #14587
  • RefreshView issue #14585
  • Can't find Apple SDK Location despite correct SDK path #14582
  • GradialRadientBrush not working as expected on Android #14581
  • android runtime error #14580
  • Can't build to local iOS device after updating MAUI workload with Hot Restart #14578

Closed

  • Entry Background Color not Changed when using inside the styles in MainPage.xaml #12991
    Backlog
  • [Android] Cannot update the Entry Background once established #12212
    Backlog
  • Android系统下RuntimeInformation.IsOSPlatform无法正常使用.与Xamarin不一致 #14579

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump Microsoft.Web.WebView2 from 1.0.1722.32 to 1.0.1722.45 #14584
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Merged

  • [net7.0] Bump xunit from 2.4.1 to 2.4.2 #14586
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Strong name the build tasks for the IDE #14080
    area/tooling ⚙️, backport/suggested
  • [Android] Allow to update Entry Background (once established) #12227
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, area/controls 🎮
  • Fix android border stroke to use dp vs px #14574
    area/controls 🎮, control-frame, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Add Controls.Compatibility to local cache #14567
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • [net7.0] [Android] Properly remove the Frame's border thickness #14565
    area/controls 🎮, control-frame
  • Fix Layout issues with the details page on Flyout #12909
    area/layout 🔲, partner/cat 😻
  • Added ICommandMapper for extension methods #14545
  • [Tests] Move sample build test to IntegrationTests #14499
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Update mappers instead of replacing field values #13836
    t/breaking 💥, do-not-merge, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Support both Update and Include for maui #14576
    area/setup 🪄
  • Add Xceed partners #14571
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [net7.0] Make MAUI into a workload based on NuGet packs #14331
    area/setup 🪄
  • Centralize logic for handling logical children #14132
  • Use Background as Fill, if Fill is null in Shapes #14216
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️
  • Fix issue using FillRule with Paths #14493
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎
  • [Android] Fix gif animation initial state #14295
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-image
  • [Windows] Update CollectionView changing ItemsLayout #14532
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/collectionview 📃
